metadata.dc:author: Knox, J M
Kaminsky, C A
metadata.dc:description: The authors discuss the main characteristics which enable a differential diagnosis to be made between the dermatoses due to atypical mycobacteria. Persistent bacteriological and epidemiologic studies are likely to result in a solution to the challenging problem presented by the conditions under consideration.
metadata.dc:title: Dermatosis por micobacterias atipicas
[Dermatoses caused by atypical mycobacteria].
